hero.title: Meet the team
hero.sub: Over five decades of combined Silicon Valley experience in AI, startups, and venture capital.

john.name: John Whaley
john.title: Co‑Founder & Managing Partner
john.bio: Serial entrepreneur; founded Moka5, UnifyID, Redcoat AI; Stanford PhD; Forbes AI 50; adjunct at Stanford.

mike.name: Mike Morris
mike.title: Co‑Founder & Managing Partner
mike.bio: 28‑year Silicon Valley veteran; early VMware engineer; led teams through 3 acquisitions and 1 IPO.
